skills.skill: 1D and 2D Modeling Software (HEC-HMS, HEC-RAS 5.0, FLO-2D, SWMM, ICPRv4)
Water Resources Skills (dams, stream restoration, stormwater BMP design, sediment transport)
Regulatory Programs Experience (FEMA NFIP, US ACE, NPDES/TPDES)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage and oversee engineering projects related to dams, stream restoration, stormwater BMP design, and other water resources.
Utilize 1D and 2D modeling software such as HEC-HMS, HEC-RAS 5.0, FLO-2D, SWMM, ICPRv4 for hydraulic and hydrologic analysis.
Utilize AutoCAD Civil 3D and ArcGIS for project design and mapping.
Apply expertise in regulatory programs such as FEMA NFIP, US ACE, NPDES/TPDES to ensure compliance and approval of projects.
Contribute to project management and coordination of engineering initiatives to achieve project goals and objectives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering (Professional Engineer Registration required).
